item.title: By: Utahcon
item.dc:creator: Utahcon
item.description: Ignite Salt Lake 3 was awesome! Was good to see you there!
item.content:encoded: Ignite Salt Lake 3 was awesome! Was good to see you there!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/08/14/ignite-salt-lake-3/#comment-2995">Laura Moncur</a>.
I watched the Big Bang Theory video clip that had on the page that explained Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock. I think watching that clip has now doubled the number of minutes of that show that I've seen :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Laura Moncur.

I watched the Big Bang Theory video clip that had on the page that explained Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock. I think watching that clip has now doubled the number of minutes of that show that I’ve seen ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Laura Moncur
item.dc:creator: Laura Moncur
item.description:
Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock is from the television show, Big Bang Theory.
If you haven't watched that show, you need to get the last two seasons watched before September rolls around. It's freakin' awesome!!
item.content:encoded:
Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock is from the television show, Big Bang Theory.

If you haven’t watched that show, you need to get the last two seasons watched before September rolls around. It’s freakin’ awesome!!
